How many people are affected by RAPADILINO syndrome ?,"RAPADILINO syndrome is a rare condition, although its worldwide prevalence is unknown. The condition was first identified in Finland, where it affects an estimated 1 in 75,000 individuals, although it has since been found in other regions.",GHR,RAPADILINO syndrome
